Blog.post: urlLink At least he still can enjoy a cup of fruppucino mocha from Starbucks in Shanghai :) urlLink
urlLink Here's one of the poor victim working in CARSEM. Poor chap was recently moved to Shanghai. I wonder how he's doing over there (with all those leng-luis around him all the time). :) urlLink
urlLink The ultimate driving machine ... the new BMW 1 Series photos are finally out and it looks fantastically fabulous! Gosh! urlLink
urlLink Got this capture from KVPUG forum. It's this guy's 666th post. Hahaha. urlLink
urlLink My closet in the Ipoh house. Looks I'm going to be there for a long long time to come. urlLink
urlLink Damn. These guys are damn cute and violent. Check them out. http://www.happytreefriends.com urlLink

Sent my girlfriend to the airport this morning. She's going back to Tawau for 2 weeks. Will be waiting for her to get back. Miss you! Saw quite a large number of people over at A&W for the KVPUG Beamfest. Looks like a great event. Too bad I couldn't stay. Had some things to do. Hopefully everything will turn out ok. *sigh*
Finally back in KL. Driving back halfway, started raining like tornado after Tg Malim. Had to serve to avoid the flying cows. *dang* Anyhow, it's good to be back!

Well. Just got back from lunch with a hefty meal of chicken rice. And what do you know, it's almost 2pm already. I'm going to cioa the miao at exactly 4:50 pm. Nobody better step in my way or they will get blown to bits. *geared to the teeth*

It's Friday, it's Friday! By lunch time, I would have no more mood to work already. Have to fill up the appraisal form and send it back to Lee Lee by today. Need to be back in the office for the appraisal on Monday. Also need to help out Eugene with certain training stuff on Monday I guess. Had "wan tan mee" for breakfast at the "tong sui" shop there. Not bad, quite a huge selection of food there. Many choices and all. Will try to leave by 5pm today. *woohoo*

Watching this Latte at 8 on tv now. Damn, this Jason Lo fella is a funny guy. You guys should really watch this talk show. It's like on midnight of Thursday and Friday morning (12 am - 1 am). He had Carsem Soo (the famous Malaysian model) on the talk show today. *wah* SingleTrackMind (Alex Wong) is on the show as well. *cool* Must seriously consider watching this I, Robot. Looks like there's some really cool effects in that show. Probably need to find some time to watch it. *yeehaw* Looks like a Skype-mania going on recently with the launch of Skype version 1.0. Don't know what so great about it. This program sucks up your resources like eating popcorn. Anyhow, if I'm ever online, be sure to add me to your list. My nick is "ntech18".
Going to go off soon. Need to head over to Jaya Jusco at Super Kinta to get some goodies for the house and have dinner. Yay!

Dang. It's raining heavily outside now. Feel like sleeping. *ZZzzzzzz* Need to meet up with Jansen to collect the SD card from his during the beamfest. Remind self to bring the cash otherwise Jansen will kill me :)

Damn jokers over at Apple Malaysia. Everything is so expensive. Like they haven't taken enough money from me with the Powerbook 15 ... now they want your arms, legs and other internal organs just to buy an iPod at ridiculous price. The idiot who went and declared the iPod as an "Audio Equipment" with the Malaysian customs should be shot, stabbed, burnt, poked, stepped on and thrown into a pit of snakes. Now we all have to pay tax on the stupid iPod. *grumble grumble* Just heard that Jack is organizing a meet-up with the Baan boy :P. Hey Jack, never ask me to come along arr... *tsk tsk*. I tumpang a ride from you and go together ler :) Time to launch Kazaa and start a download fest ... *muahahahaha*

Terrible blokes over in the office. Takes forever to clear claims and salary. It's already 29th of July and the money is not even in the account yet ... *grrrr* What's there to approve. This is like a monthly ritual right. Just clear the damn cheque and give me the cash already. *grind teeth in fury* Had a nice breakfast and now back to work. Nothing much exciting in the e-mails nowadays. I wonder if the spam filters have anything to do with it. *hmm* Now to move on to important task ... like checking KVPUG and MYMUG forums. Will post up later updates when I find them. By the way, for those who needs the latest traffic report, don't forget to check urlLink http://www.kvpug.org/traffic.cfm .

Still stuck in CARSEM. Damn sleepy and hungry. What to do? What to do? Maybe I should play sending e-mails out to my hate list. Start a post-fest in KVPUG and MYMUG. Just remember that this Saturday got KVPUG beamfest, MYMUG gathering and PC Fair all at the same time. So many things to do and so little time. *sigh*

Well, up to Ipoh once again. Good thing I've decided to take a slow drive up travelling at 90-100 km/h. There usual speed trap is at it again. They were trapping people near the 90km/h limit (the hilly area). Terrible blokes. At least I saw Insp. Ibrahim there and gave him a friendly gesture :) CARSEM, CARSEM, CARSEM... *sigh*... getting tired of this place. Oh well.. back to work.
Hahaha. I read this over at Buaya69's blog. Check it out: http://viewtru.blogspot.com/2004_08_01_viewtru_archive.html#109166952072596245

Well. It's officially Wednesday. This means one more day before returning to KL. Got a call from the Alpha Romeo sales-person. He mentioned that someone has booked my car (the Silver color Alfa 147) ... *the bastard* Anyhow, in order to get the color, I need to undercut that person by getting the loan approved first. If his/her loan gets approved first then the car will be lost. If that's the case, I told him not to give me any other color. I would get the Honda Jazz instead. That car would be my secondary choice ... *yummy* We'll just have to wait and see how thing goes ... *patience*
Damn. I'm hungry. And it's only 3:30 pm. *gosh* Good thing I bought some "siew pau" during lunch time. *hehehe* Trying to see if I can get into TTPC. Will give it a try :)

Bought some chewing and bubble gums from a shop in 1 Utama a few days ago. Wow! They are fantastic. Love 'em. Didn't bring my model car up. Feeling so bored in the house. Maybe I'll just enjoy watching tv :) Got a presentation later in the afternoon from 4:30 pm - 6:30 pm. Looks like I will ened to find a bullet proof vest before stepping in to the room. Maybe I can loan a tank from a nearby army bunker *evil laughter*

Ok ler. Back in Ipoh again. Didn't bring my car model kit up. Was raining in the morning and I didn't want my model to get wet. *shucks* Latest update I got from Pankaj (currently still in Shanghai) is he's going back to India on the 13th August 2004 and picking up his visa on the 16th August 2004. This means he would be back in KL a few days after that. Have a safe trip buddy. Looks like he's having fun over there. Waiting for your photos :) Got confirmation on the iPod. I can get a rebate of RM 760 on the new iPod (4th generation). This means I only need to pay RM 739 for the new 20GB iPod (original price is RM 1499). Still damn expensive if you ask me but dang ... it's an iPod. Love those machines. Don't think I can afford it though. So if anyone is interested in buying the rebate from me, I can sell to you for RM 300 :)
Wow. World record. Shopping around in 1 Utama with my girlfriend and my girlfriend's sister from 10 am till 5 pm. *hectic*

Wow. I didn't know that there's so many type of rules and different way of handling death ceremony. Anyhow my grandfather was sent for cremation today. Will be going up to Nirvana Memorial Park tomorrow. Should be going back to work next week. Thank you all for your support!

Well. My grandfather passed away on the 4th August 2004 at about 3pm. Tried to rush back from Ipoh but couldn't make it in time. *sigh* Will be moving out to the crematorium on Friday at around 2pm and then to Nirvana. Would probably not be blogging for the next few days.

Looks like my grandfather might not be able to make it. I will need to find a way to get back to KL from Ipoh. Probably need to catch a cab to get back. Need to book a flight for Cynthia as well to get back to KL. *sob sob*
When only can go back leh? So sleepy and hungry already. Need to go Jusco to buy some supplies as well. *sigh*

Doctor tried to find a vein to do the drip needle but couldn't find one using the x-ray machine. Now resorting to plan B which is to use a feeding tube down the nose. This way, we still can feed him with vitamins and water and hopefully he can remove the urea content. *worried*

Back in CARSEM once again. Still worried about my grandfather's condition. Reported some Material Issue - Additional Request, IQA and Cost Block Template issues at CARSEM. Let's get it all completed so we can get them out of sight. Not to mention that the autopack setup customization will start next week. *ARGH!* Going to see if I can find some nice Winamp Moderm skins .... *yummy*
Grandfather going for a dangerous operation tomorrow. I hope he pulls through and survives this. *sob sob*

Well. Gone for appraisal and survived it. Someone sent me an SMS telling me Steve Jobs has gone for an operation for cancer (but he's fine). The news is here: http://news.zdnet.co.uk/business/0,39020645,39162359,00.htm Now just wait for time to go back. The damn air-cond is off now and it's so darn hot.

Finally got back to the office. Life is getting so boring at Ipoh. There's suppose to be an appraisal happening today (don't know when though). Let's see how it goes. There were two new developer in the office today. Both of them are into Axapta. Heh... *suckers* Don't know when I need to go up to Ipoh again. Probably need to follow Pei Hsien since I'm preparing to sell my current car. Grandfather in the hospital. Looks like pretty bad condition. *having lots of faith* I hope he can pull through this challenge like what he did many imes before. *sad sad* Cynthia (my girlfriend) is back in Tawau. Hi there! Guess she must be having a great time :)

Yippeekayee! The salary is finally in the account. Damn buggers take so long to get the salary approved. Oh shit. That reminds me. I have to get my claims up and ready as well. Shit! Back to work on the claims. PC Fair last day today. Must be like “pasar malam” there. Went for a really nice lunch (and cheap as well) over at Sri Kembangan. Nice place to eat. Must go back for more next time. * woohoo * OK. More later.
